reviews.review: Great Driver. What can I say about Putu. He is great. Super friendly. Very knowledgable. We learned a lot from him. Very responsive. English was excellent. We spent a superb day with Putu and would recommend anyone to email him if your in Bali.

Best driver in Bali!. We booked a day tour with Putu via WhatsApp. Booking was quite easy singe Putu was very responsive.The tour itself and the guidance by Putu was amazing. Before the start we dicussed with him the places we wanted to visite and further possible places to see.During the tour Putu provided us with many information on the Balinese lifestyle and the different attractions we saw.Putu is a great driver, very friendly and helpful. We enjoyed our time with him very much. If you are looking for a great tour with a private driver choose Putu!

Fantastic driver (Ketut). We had the chance to got Ketut, a friend of Putu, as driver during 3 days. Ketut was really a nice guy, he showed us all typical things to see about Bali (Restaurant, Coffee break, Sate,...) and explained us all we wanted to know and more than that with a good English. Ketut has a good knowledge of the island, he used a lot of shortcut to avoid traffic. He had some really nice ideas for planning our tours day after day and see more than we wanted.Ask Putu to get Ketut as driver and you will enjoy Bali like us :D.

Knowledgeable . We made a last minute arrangements with Putu and he send his friend Ketut to pick us up at the airport. Ketut is very easy going and will drive us to places we wish to go. Brought us to Bedugul Temple and explained to us the history and also to a nice picturesque paddy field with lesser tourists . Ketut is also very well versed with shortcut routes and save us a lot of time in the traffic

Fantastic service, best driver to book!. I came across Putu's service on Trip Advisor when searching for someone to take myself and my partner on a day trip to temples and waterfalls around Ubud. Putu had great reviews so I contacted him. His communication was fantastic, he was quick to respond and answered all my questions. Putu was unavailable on the day we wanted, but he advised me that Nyoman was free instead. I am so glad we had Nyoman for the day, he was fantastic!!! He picked us up from our resort near Ubud and took us to all the best temples and gave us advise on how not to get scammed, which was a huge help. He then took us to a fantastic place to have a buffet lunch overlooking the rice fields (we shouted him lunch for his excellent service) it was absolutely beautiful. Then on to Tegenungan Waterfall where we spent a couple of hours swimming, whilst Nyoman waited patiently in the car. Nyoman was great to chat to in the car and gave us lots of great history on Bali that was extremely informative. We can't fault his service at all, and we are so glad we booked with him. As we also needed to get from Ubud to airport two days latter, we hired him to take us. He was promptly waiting for us at the front of our resort and helped us with all our luggage and again at the airport. Such a lovely person, and we will definitely be booking his service again the next time we are in Bali. Thank you so much Nyoman!

Fantastic Day. I found Putu here on TA and tought I´d give it a try on short notice. It worked out and we had a woderful day with him. We had some sport we´d love to see and he suggested another additional spot (waterfall).We left the hotel at 8.30(am) in the morning, where he was more than on time. He was even some minutes befor time at the hotel.At the end of the day he dropped us off again at the hotel at 18:30 (6.30pm). Inbetween we saw a coffe plantation, Ricefields (which I still can´t pronounce :D), Waterfalls and a Temple.Puti is "only" a driver, but he can explain everything you need to know about the spots you´d like to see and about Bali in general.He is such a nice person, unbelievable friendly.We enjoyed our day with him a lot and would absolutely recommend him for further bookings.

Exploring bali with putu. We had an awesome day with putu, he was really friendly and attentive! He picked us up at our stay then we discussed the route of our trip, he told us the tipical route and asked us if we want to switch something or if we want to add something.During the trip he tould us everything we wanted to know, about the history of bali, religions and everything we wanted to know.So all in all we had a beautiful day, thanks to putu! :)

Excellent service. Being our first visit to Bali, we were on the lookout for a experienced person with good local knowledge of the varied places in Bali. Must admit Mr Sarwa was perfect in his role and discharged his duties professionally. We will recommend him and the services of Mr. Putu to anyone visiting Bali in future.

Great guide! . Ketut was our driver for two days when we explored Bali. Reservations were made via email and was very painless. Price was on par with other companies but what you really pay for here is the except driving service and their knowledge of the area and history. Ketut's English was very good and easy to understand. He was very prompt mtg at the hotel in the morning. The itinerary I had in mind was a guideline of what we wanted to do, but Ketut was very flexible in adding/removing things to the itinerary. His driving was very good and not scary despite the craziness of the Bali roads. Ketut joined us touring the different sites and was able to provide some info about the history and help us take pictures. Definitely recommend their services!

VERY HELPFUL PERSON . Mr. Putu was very helpful during our trip to Bali. He gave information regarding the placesto visit apart from our itinerary, why we should visit as also regarding entrance fees, the places to dine and many helpful tips. His partner Mr. Ketut was alsoa helpful person. If you are traveling to Bali, you have to book in advance, becausehe is much in demand and booked well in advance.

absolutely AMAZING service. We spend 7 days with Ketut Belo as our driver. The experience was simply amazing. Ketut was extremely cheerful and friendly and explained us everything about their amazing island: traditions, religion, tips, etc. He was ALWAYS on time, and was very professional. We had own list of places we wanted to visit and he adapted to ALL of them perfectly. He also made some suggestions, and we managed to vist MANY different places during these days. Definitely, visiting Bali with a driver is the best choice one can make. But visiting Bali with Ketut as your driver will be an unforgettable experience!! Thanks for all Ketut!!! :-)

Putu & ketut. The daytour we had with ketut was very nice! We visited five tempels inthe east part of bali and during our drive, ketut explained a lot of interesting stuff about bali traditionel. We strongly recommend this trip.

daytrips in Bali. We decided to book some daytrips after reading good reviews about Putu on Trip. He replied very promptly to my emails and gave us some suggestions about the trips. Finally, we took 3 day trips (on September 16, 17 and 19) with Ketut as a driver and we visited the major attractions of the island. Ketut was very punctual, patient, good driver and provide us a lot of information about the places visited and the country. Overall, it was a very good decision to choose Putu Driver in Bali.

Amazing driver, amazing experience. Meeting Putu was the highlight of our Bali trip. Putu is so kind, caring and funny! We were smiling and laughing the entire day. The time flew by as he took the time to discuss the ins and outs of Bali ceremonies and customs, family life and also gave us detailed information about the places we were going. We went up to the Sekumpul waterfalls - he personally walked us to the trailhead to make sure we didn't get lost getting there - a good 30 minute hike in the heat and humidity! He is so easy to talk to and genuinely wants you to have a good time. We went up to Pura Ulun Danu Bratan - Putu had the foresight to suggest we stop there first, to avoid the hoards of tourist buses - when we first got there, we were pretty much alone (us and maybe only 10 other tourists) - when we passed by there later the parking lot was full of buses. So glad we happened to find Putu on Trip Advisor. I highly recommend booking him and booking ahead. I hope to return to Bali soon, and when we do, we'll be calling Putu!

Meeting Putu. For anyone wanting a driver in Bali, look no further than Putu. Nothing is a concern and he is very flexible with wherever you want to go or do. Like all Balinese he is only too willing to please and we give him top marks for service, courtesy and overall politeness at all times. Very comfortable air conditioned people mover that seats 6 or 4 with a lot of suitcases for airport transfers. We advise to book well ahead of your visit as he is very popular. Well done Putu! When we visit again and again we will always go with Putu.

Best Decision - Great Time!. We engaged Putu at the last minute via Whatsapp, but it was the best decision ever. We discussed prior to arriving in Bali and on the day itself where to visit. Putu was great in providing different options and we settled on Tanah Lot, the Monkey Forest, Rice Fields and the Terraces. The tour took over just about 10 hours (including Bali traffic). THE HIGHLIGHT of the day was the walk through rice fields, all on our own. He dropped us off at one end, and as we followed a well-set path along the fields, he picked us up on the other side. This was by far the best as it was off the beaten track and definitely not on the regular 'tour list'. Putu was also not only punctual but he was the most patient person (even when we took longer than we should). He was always concerned for our safety as well. We had a blast and would highly recommend Putu to lone & group travelers alike!

Great and safe 7 days!. We (3 couples) found Putu Driver in Bali on TripAdvisor 2 weeks before our trip. He was not available for the days we needed a driver and he sent Ketut. Ketut is a wonderful person, passionate about his culture and religion, always in time and felt us feel safe throughout the 7 days. We had an itinerary but Ketut made it better, including other interesting things too, making our days full. He took us to the best restaurants, got us the best offers (e.g. Gili Air trip), he even recovered my slippers that were stolen and took in the jungle by the monkeys at Uluwatu! After we had arrived in Gili Air he texted me on whatsapp to make sure we are fine. We really created a bond with him, Ketut being more than a driver; we laughed a lot and he answered with a smile on his face to all our questions about Bali and hinduism. Ketut is now our friend. Don't hesitate to contact Putu Driver in Bali and ask for Ketut if you plan a vacation in Bali. Thank you for everything!

The best choice we took in Bali!. Hello! We booked for Putu but he wasn't available for the period we wanted so we got Ketut instead! Ketut was amazing from all points of view.Very punctual, very funny and he'll drive you wherever you want any time you want with his smile on his face.He is a very experienced driver and knows the island very good.Also you can ask for lunch places or dinner places to eat because he knows the best food at cheap prices . If you told him to be at 8:00am at your hotel,he will be there at 7:45:) Ketut was for us an amazing driver,a good guide and a hell of a traditional story teller.The best choice for travelling in Bali is with a driver and with the hand on my heart i tell you that Putu or Ketut are the best! Take care guys and continue with what you're doing because their not so many drivers in Bali who do this with passion and commitment! PS: don't think to rent a car by yourself in Bali because the traffic is a chaos and you need a driver with experience!
Great tour!. Had a great day! Very nice driver that speaks good english! Seen some beautiful places. And i could recommend everyone this tour.

Brilliant 3 days visiting many wonderful sights.. My son found Putu's website and booked him for our stay while back in the UK. We loved spending time with him. He took us to the places we had researched online and fit in lots of other sights too. It was lovely to have someone who was so interactive and being a local he gave us a real taste of the real and the tourist Bali. With enough information about the places we visited, without making us feel as though we were back at school, we had a really wonderful time.

DRIVER IN BALI. I called Putu in the morning two hours before we had planned to made our trip. He was super nice and it was no problem to send us a driver. Our driver for the day was Denni. To sum it up this guy is the best in whole bali. He was always on time, more than nice, conversed with us and told us interesting things. He drove us from sanur to ubud (including waterfall, monkey sanctuary, rice terrace etc). We were so happy and excited with him that we booked him for the day after to visit Mt. Batur vulcano (where he also organized us a sherpa). He also helped us to get speed boat Tickets to the gilis. Because we were late and all shops were closed, he met up with us in kuta (in his spare time!!!) to get us tickets and information. After we had arrived on gilis he texted me on whatsapp if we're fine and if everything worked well. I really want to thank him for everything, he is a great person and he made our trip really special. If you need a ride in bali don't hesitate to call Denni or call Putu and ask for Denni!!!

Great day. Me and my girlfriend wanted to do a day trip and visit Tirta Gannga. Fortunately, we came by Putu on TripAdvisor and we didnt regret it. Putu had another appointment the next day, so he sent Ketut to help us. He was very helpful from the start, making a complete itinerary and filling the time with other attractions that we could see after tirta gannga. I had a lot of questions about Bali culture and Bali ways and Ketut answered all of them with a smile on his face, happy to share the info. We would highly recommend Ketut for further visits !

Just won't get Better. We came across Putu from my niece who visited Bali last year. We were first time visitors and put ourselves in his hands. It was the best choice we did. Putu took a lot of time to explain to us all about Bali, its people and the culture. He consulted with us the whole way to make sure we were happy with what we were doing, outline options and then allowed us to make a decision. He was gracious and provided us with unequaled assistance. Putu's aim for the day is for us all to have a "fun" time. At the end of the day he even gave us some advice on what to do and what to keep an eye out for so we weren't ripped off. Our hotel organised another day trip for us and whilst this guy was okay, he wasn't near the professionalism or interactive that we got with Putu. He is essential if you want to see/learn about Bali. More than a driver.

just...the perfect!. if you want to see the best places in bali and learn about the culture of balinese, the only choise is putu. He loves his work, he is 100% professional, very kind,very very friendly, he speaks very well the english language (not like my terrible english) and realy he is very flexible if you have plan.Ι suggest putu over 3 days because bali has many many beautiful places to see. Putu thanks for all, you are guide, photographer, musician and my hero, you are the number 1 my friend!

Thank you for the two great days Putu!. Putu is a very friendly, funny and flexible person! He plans his tours according to your wishes, on the other hand he tells you, if he knows a better place to go. Putu tells you a lot of funny and interesting things about the balinese lifestyle and culture. He helps you wherever he can. Putu answered all our questions and gave us many advices what we need to do else in Bali. In contrast to the most other taxi drivers is Putu a very safe driver. If you wanna have a funny and awesome day, you should hire Putu as your driver!

Amazing Day Trip. Putu was the best guide that we had ever ask for. Our trip was very spontaneous but Putu too. It was very easy to contact him and also the planing of our trip. He responded our own ideas of the trip but also added some intreseting things (traditional backroundinformation, secret places). Don't worry about the rain: Putu has some helpful ideas and umbrellas! We also can say that Putu was the most kindest person that we met and we can recommend him to everyone who wants a realy individually driver who is not interestet to do his big business just having a nice day trip with new people. Finally we can say at the end of the day you will see how you appreciate Putu's work.

Putu is the answer!. We spent two amazing days with Putu, 31th july and 1st august 2016.He has been always a great host, everytime kind, soooo nice and really really friendly. He Made everything to make us feel "at home" and he totally succeded in that, we can say we spent two days with a friend and not just with a driver! Putu not just drove around: he was really fast in replying to our emails when we were still in italy, giving us many advices about itinerary, timing (when it's better to go in a place during the day) and places that is best/worst to visit. Once on the place, he is going to give you many helpful advices, tips and tricks so useful for a tourist. What he is going to do, il you are curious as we are, is giving you an immersive experience in the balinese culture, you can really "breathe" Bali!!! Moreover he will give you suggestions on the food, making you avoid unhealthy restaurants during the visits... And most of all thank you for the info about babi guling :))). We really recommend Putu, if you want to spend time with a funny, nice, kind person, Putu is your man!!Emma&Mao

#readysetbali. This review is long overdue but I definitely wanted to write an amazing review. Anyways, my husband and I had booked Putu Driver May 2016. Putu, was very quick to respond with our inquiries and the booking was straight forward and easy. He assigned us Kutu to be our driver. It was our first time in Bali and we're glad we had a local to drive us around. Kutu, was an awesome guy he's very nice, speaks good english, and has a lot of knowledge of Bali. We had a pretty good list of things to do and see and Kutu helped us organized the days we should tackle our list. He also made some amazing recommendations and I'm glad he did. For an example, in Ubud we were able to do a free coffee/tea tasting, took us to some nice beaches like Padang Padang, and you must ask him about the seafood restaurant in Jimbaran. He worked with your schedule and he was always on time. The price was very reasonable and the company is very trustworthy. I highly recommend booking with Putu Driver when your in Bali

2 great trips. Me and my girlfriend travelled with Putu twice during our holiday. First we went from Ubud to Amed in a whole day trip, while visiting nice places along the route. The fact that we wanted to stop in a different location than we started was no problem at all. Before we left, we discussed the planning of the day with a map, where he adjusted the planning and route to our liking.Because of our great experience the first trip, we asked Putu to pick us up after our arrival per boat in Sanur to bring us to the airport a few hours later, with a nice detour to visit the Tanah Lot temple.Putu himself is one of the nicest guys we've met on Bali. His english is very good and his driving style just perfect. His tips to avoid tourist traps at various locations are very helpful. His knowledge of Bali and the tourist hotspots is good and we learnt a lot from him during the tours.Thanks Putu!Jim and Mieke

We love Putu!. My boyfriend and I spent an amazing day exploring the area around Ubud with Putu. We have been on Bali for three weeks now and this was by far our favourite day. Putu is an extremely friendly, happy and welcoming person who takes great care of his customers. You simply have to like him immediately. Putu was born in Ubud, so he knows the area very well and we learned a lot about life on Bali. We just trusted him with the itinerary he suggested for the day and it turned out to be great. We would not have thought of most of the spots on our own and it was a good mix of nature and culture. Also Putu went above and beyond to make sure that we did not fall for any tourist traps, spend too much on entrance fees etc. For example he took a detour to a free lookout to show us the view of Mt. Batur instead of just going the easy way and letting us pay the entrance fee of the main viewing point. After being on the road for almonst 10 hours he still asked if we wanted to go for a little hike. He didn't seem to care about finishing work after a long day. His priority was that we have a good experience.We highly recommend a day tour with Putu and cannot think of anything bad to write about him. We felt really spoilt that day, because we could just lean back and enjoy beautiful Bali, while Putu had thought of everything. Thank you, Putu :)

Best day tour ever!. Wow, what a wonderful day we spent with Ketut! He took us to so many places in one day and we loved every moment! We started with a cultural dance, the a visit to see locals making silver, then to ubud where we went to the markets and temple. From there we went to visit the rice fields (which It was raining for so he took us back after visiting a visita of a volcano (the volcano we probably could have skipped but we didn't know what we we going to see!) we then went to Taste tea and luwak coffee, and visited a water temple. The highlights were the water temple which and the luwak coffee plantation! He gave us a good amount of time at each and we did it all within 10 hours- which flew by! Ketut answered all my questions, and I had a few! I could tell how passionate he was a it sharing his culture with us. We would highly recommend Ketut! Great day out and I will be telling anyone I know going to Bali to spend a day with him of they can fit it in!

A Fantastic Experience . Putu drove our family today from Ubud to Amed. From first contact his communication was excellent. He speaks excellent English and is polite, prompt and engaging.He organised a vehicle that suited my particular requirements and planned a really interesting itinerary of stops along the way from Ubud to Amed. He is a very safe and considerate driver, even pulling off the road and stopping the car the one time his cellphone rang rather than answering while driving.He was very friendly and warm and happily answered my many questions about Balinese culture and life. I learnt a lot from his explanations and felt at the end of the day I had a deeper understanding of Bali and its people.He also shared with us useful information about the sights we visited including tips and advice on how to handle touts, sellers etc.It was a really great experience traveling with Putu. When he dropped us off in Amed at the end of the day it felt like saying goodbye to a friend. I would wholeheartedly recommend him for tours or transfers around Bali.

Amazing day . Just back from a brilliant day out with Putu. Firstly, Putu is a legend of a guy, really happy, good fun and with loads of knowledge and stories. We wanted to go from ubud to candidasa and asked for some nature/scenery, a waterfall and maybe a temple, the rest we were easy. Putu suggested a few different routes, we settled on one, which brought us through stunning landscapes which surpassed our expectations, with Putu constantly checking in to see if we were happy or wanted a change of plan. He was happy to stop at any stage for photos and answer any questions about life in Bali. We would definitely recommend a day out with Putu, real value for money and you get to meet a really nice guy too!

Great day in Bali. Putu is an excellent driver & guide. He picked us up from the ship and took us to Tegallalang rice terrace, Kintamani to see Mount Batur & the lake. Then lunch at a good restaurant, before visiting Tirta Empul temple and a Balinese traditional house.Excellent value for money. Would highly recommend.We were back at the ship in plenty of time.
Ubud day trip. Friendly and helpful, no shopping, excellent driving skill, nice car and good planning among the whole trip. Very good service.

Fantastic host for our drive from Ubud to Amed. We were very last minute in organizing ourselves, and wrote to Putu a day before our transfer from Ubud to Amed. Putu was very quick and helpful to respond and, as he was already with guests on that day, he recommended Ketut as our driver. Ketut was so friendly and welcoming ( and, is a very safe driver, which was welcome on the windy roads through the mountains). He was extremely helpful in answering all our many, many questions about Bali and Indonesia. On the way to Amed, Ketut made several sightseeing stops (we even, by chance had he opportunity to see a temple ceremony) and he bus very knowledgeable about all the stories, details and history of each site. Would definitely call Putu and Ketut if we are back in Bali! Thanks again for the wonderful day, Ketut! :)

Great driver. Our trip from Ubud to Amed with Putu was a pleasure from the start to finish. He speaks excellent English and is happy to share his knowledge of Bali along the way. He is a safe and courteous driver. His big smile is an added bonus!

Awesome day!! . We were in Ubud for 4 days and spent one day with Putu, doing all the famous attractions in and around Ubud. Putu was perfectly on time and is such a friendly person! He considered all of our and wishes and made the day so special. His English is excellent and he told us a lot about the Balinese culture. We had so many questions and he just knew everything and was so happy to help us. :) We can warmly recommend you to choose Putu out of the many private drivers, it is really worth it! :)) Thank you again, Putu and all the best for you! Cheers, Sina and Larissa

Great driver. I really happy to know him. He was our guide and driver for 3 days. He knows his job very well. Before we go to Bali I sent my travel program to him, he warned me about a few places which they can ruin my holiday, special thanks for the warning. He is punctual and knowledgeable about Bali. We felt safe when he was driving. We also used he's internet 2 times, I think it was really important. The car was comfortable and A/C was working perfect. We also learned a lot of thing about Bali from him, like their culture, history, family structure etc. If I go to Bali again, I definetely will use his service. Thanks again for everything.

Friendly, effective, and really experienced. At first, I wanted to hire Mr. Putu. Because of a huge misunderstanding on my part, Mr. Putu advised me to go with Mr. Ketut. At first, I told him that for the day trip, the only thing I've decided is to go to Tegallalang Rice Terrace and I left the rest of the day up to him. Even with such a vague request, he ended up organizing the most amazing day in my life so far! I experienced the luxury of Ubud and also the ways of local living in Ubud by having an exquisite hot bath overlooking the Agung Mt., and having a mujair fish at a warung- he really knows every little things about Ubud since he's a local who's very experienced in his field. He even helped me to wash my shoes when I fell to the muds! I would also recommend you to talk to him before you go to organize your trip to make things easier, because he knows what to bring to a place and when is the best time to go. Mr. Ketut is an amazing, friendly man who makes sure that you have an unforgettable experience in Bali.

Best decision you will make! **NO regrets**. Putu was a phenomenal driver/tour guide. I have to say that when my husband advised he was hiring a private driver to take us around Bali, I was a little hesitant. I was worried that if we did not like the driver, we'd be stuck with the driver the entire trip because we already paid. Let me tell you, by the end of the trip I was actually sad to have to say goodbye to Putu and even tried to convince him to move back to the states with us! Ha! With his help we were able to see so many gorgeous sites in Bali. We have children and with the crazy drivers in Indonesia, I always felt very safe while he was driving my family around. We have so many memories from the places we visited. Even more than the sites we visited, we enjoyed Putu's company. He's genuinely a nice person and EVERYONE in my family was happy to have him as our tour guide. He truly looks out for your best interest and tells you what potential dangers to look out for with each location. Thank you, Putu, for everything!! We will definitely keep in touch for our next visit to Bali.

Highly recommended Driver. Putu picked us up on our arrival, transferred us to our next destination and also took us for a full day out and about around Ubud away from the centre. He was always punctual, friendly, knowledgable and drove very safely. Putu also offered useful advice about things to avoid and best options for everyday interactions in Bali. One day his car had to go in for some repairs so he borrowed a car from his cousin for the day. Easy to chat to, Putu is a genuinely warm and caring person. I would Highly recommend for anyone to engage Putu while visiting Bali. We certainly will look him up on a return visit .

We loved it. Me and my girlfriend had a one Day tour around Bali with Putu. He is such a kind guy, and always smiling! He was really caring and made sure that we was okay at all times. The trip he had planned for us was amazing. I couldnt recommend Putu enough, he really is such a great guy :-) Kind regards Camilla and Nikolaj!

Best Bali private driver. We had two days with Ketut driving us around. One day up to Ubud and another down to Uluwatu and Jimbaran bay. Nothing was too much for Ketut. Excellent English and accomodating to what we wanted. So friendly and felt safe at all times.Also lots of Indonesian information along the way..Very quick to reply to message when trying to book.Ketut even organised a special cake for my husbands birthday. Thanks for making our adventures so much easier.I'll be keeping his number and telling all my friends to get Ketut as their driver.#1 in Bali.

Reliable driver. Well-mannerd, English-speaking driver. Recommend all to solo-traveler, couple, and family. Drive safely, punctual, care about his guest in a professional attitude and friendly as well. He helps make your vacation relaxing, fun, and as you like (he does not offer more than you want as you often encounter in tourism places. You can focus only on enjoying what you want in your relaxing travel). Also, his car is clean and spacious.

Fantastic!. We had an idea in our heads of what we wanted to see and Putu made it happen with excellent suggestions! He took us to see rice fields and terraces, artists and woodworkers, Mt. Batur, a brilliant coffee plantation, two temples and a local black sand beach; all in a day! He is a really helpful and interesting man and we thoroughly enjoyed our day with him. We could not recommend him highly enough!

Great guide, lovely person. We had a great couple days with Putu driving around Bali, we had a vague idea of what we wanted to do and Putu made it happen. Very helpful, accommodating, knowledgeable and extremely friendly, we enjoyed being in the van going to our destinations as much as we did the destinations themselves. Would definitely recommend. Thanks again Putu!

Great day doing what we wanted. Thanks Putu for sending Ketut as our amazing tour guide/driver. He was super helpful in making our day perfect. Great blend of what we set out to do and his wonderful suggestions. Highly recommended!

Ketut is the best!. Don't even hesitate and book Ketut as your driver he is incredible, so much knowledge, so friendly, great suggestions for stops off and had us laughing all the way on our day tour. If you were like me and looking through all the reviews this is the one for you! Ketut thank you!

Outstanding Services. Putu was friendly and flexible to our needs. He was honest and recommended great places to make our Bali trip memorable. We utilized his service for 3 days, including the last day to take us to airport late at night. His rate is reasonable and comparable to other drivers. Will definitely call him up again on our next trip to Bali.

100% Trustworthy Bali Guide. Putu Supartana is very keen, he's got the inside info about Bali and will totally tailor your tour to whatever you want it to be.
If you want a hardworking guy who goes the extra mile to please the clients and make sure they're happy, Putu is your man. A great example of what I love about people in Bali.

Fabulous driver-guide. We hired Putu for 2 days for a private tour of Bali. Putu was a delight, introducing us to his native island in a very personal way, showing us the real Beauty of Bali away from the crowds. We personalized our 2 days which the areas which interested us the most. We were never forced into any shops or 'factories', but only shown what we wanted to see. He is from Ubud, which meant we could see the local back streets, with the native Bali way of life, away from tourist crowds. We highly recommend his very reasonable services.
